name: Dense Mandala // packed with primitives
description: A Mandala is one's imaginary palace for contemplating the universe. Each object represents an aspect of wisdom or a principle.  Slow the mind, watch it turn, disappear then return. This Mandala is a breathing moving star of pastel polygons. This series of artworks is intended to explore what is possible when constrained to extremely simple shapes and colours. Can they lead to transcendence?   [Key Variables: numPoints: 128, minSides:12, maxSides: 227]
